titleStmt.title: A defense of the ecclesiasticall regiment in Englande defaced by T. C. in his replie agaynst D. VVhitgifte. Seene and allowed according to the order appoynted in the Queenes Maiesties iniunctions.
titleStmt.author: Northampton, Henry Howard, Earl of, 1540-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Bynneman, for Humfrey Toy,

notesStmt.note: By Henry Howard, Earl of Northampton.
A reply to: Cartwright, Thomas. A replye to an answere made of M. Doctor Whitgifte.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
